### AddUsersIfInteresting() {#aaae0691d9859142f6bcfb992862e44a9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IVUsers::AddUsersIfInteresting (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}>
AddUsersIfInteresting - Inspect the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>.

Inspect the specified instruction.

If it is a reducible <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>, recursively add its users to the IVUsesByStride set and return true. Otherwise, return false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivusers-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivusers-h">IVUsers.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#l00136">136</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp">IVUsers.cpp</a>.
